title: Mark Carney - Wikipedia
snippet: Mark Joseph Carney (born March 16, 1965) is a Canadian politician and economist who has been serving as the 24th prime minister of Canada since 2025. He has also been leader of the Liberal Party and the member of Parliament (MP) for Nepean since 2025.

title: Prime Minister of Canada - Premier ministre du Canada

title: Premiership of Mark Carney - Wikipedia
snippet: The premiership of Mark Carney began on March 14, 2025, when the first Cabinet headed by Mark Carney was sworn in by Governor General Mary Simon. Carney was invited to form the 30th Canadian Ministry and become the 24th Prime Minister of Canada ...

title: Oil executives once booed Canada’s prime minister. Now they cheer him.
snippet: Mark Carney, once a U.N. special envoy on climate action and finance, is now winning praise from industry but alienating former environmental allies. ... Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney, as governor of the Bank of England in 2015, attends the U.N. Climate Change Conference in Paris, where nations negotiated the Paris agreement.
